page.title: 10Cupar Local News
page.content: The Fife Herald News contains details of local major{events.}1985 marks the Bi_Centenary of{Cupar Old Parish {Church.}An exhibition featuring the {Old Parish Church,}Cupar , which although dates back to 1415 , was re_built 200 years ago, will be held throughout the month of June.An open air service is to be given on the Duffus Park cricket pitch . { Cupar Gala Week}is held at the beginning of June. This is an annual { festival}& begins with a Children's Parade from the Cart Haugh to the Duffus Park where one child is crowned as the Gala Queen. The week long programme of activities includes a swimming gala, domino tournament, bowling and darts competitions as well as an annual quiz.
